text:
Aww yeah, let's learn English 
with The Big Bang Theory!

In case you're new here we help you to 
learn fast English without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without subtitles.
In fact Daniel says that our channel should be

called the number one YouTube 
channel for learning English.

So don't forget to hit that Subscribe 
button and the Bell down below,

so that you don't miss a 
single one of our new lessons.

Now let's learn English with this 
hilarious scene from The Big Bang Theory.

Do you find it difficult to 
understand fast speaking natives?

Then I highly recommend our 
Fluent with Friends Course.

In this 48-week course you will learn 
with the first two seasons of Friends.

You'll receive PDF power lessons, 
vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle 
Global Community and so much more!

And did you know you can try it right 
now for FREE with our 3-Part Masterclass!

All you have to do is click up 
here or down in the description box

below to learn more and sign up now.
We look forward to seeing you there!

If you're enjoying this lesson then 
I highly recommend you check out

our Big Bang Theory playlist, where 
you'll find loads more great lessons,

where you can learn pronunciation, 
vocabulary and even more!

You can click up here or down in the description 
box below to choose your next lesson.
